title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, goals, and timeline. Establish project management processes and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, gather comprehensive requirements (including edge cases and error scenarios), and perform a detailed analysis of the needs and preferences of potential users for the AI Life Assistant. Collaborate with stakeholders and cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with project goals and objectives. This task includes identifying key features, system constraints, and user expectations for a successful implementation. Upon completion, document findings in a clear, concise format and present to the team.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for AI_Life_Assistant following a modular and layered approach with components like user interface, business logic, data access, and external integrations. The design should emphasize scalability, security, performance optimization, maintainability, usability, and accessibility. Consider microservices or serverless architecture for better scalability and maintainability, incorporate security best practices such as data encryption at rest and in transit, and plan for performance optimizations (caching, load balancing, asynchronous processing). Discuss the need for testing methodologies (unit tests, integration tests, system tests) and quality assurance processes during development and deployment. Use agile methodologies for iterative development and continuous delivery/integration. Provide a detailed design document outlining high-level architecture, individual component designs, and interfaces between components. Include a roadmap for implementation and timelines. Investigate the use of containerization technologies (Docker or Kubernetes) for deployment flexibility and portability. Also, consider machine learning techniques to improve AI's decision-making capabilities and real-time data processing techniques for specific use cases. Discuss potential benefits and requirements for edge computing in specific use cases, and plan for monitoring and logging to ensure system performance and security. Finally, discuss the need for a modular design that allows easy replacement or updating of individual components as needed. If possible, propose an initial architecture sketch or diagram. Update the rfc_state field to 'UNDER_REVIEW'.

title: Data Management and Storage for AI Life Assistant
description: Define data models, storage solutions, and data management strategies considering user privacy, performance optimization, scalability, and adaptability to individual preferences and needs. Include a discussion on the use of caching mechanisms to improve system response times, focusing on implementing a LRU (Least Recently Used) cache strategy for frequent user requests and dynamic cache eviction based on user activity patterns. Additionally, propose an approach to handle cache inconsistencies in real-time collaborative scenarios.

title: AI and Machine Learning Components
description: Develop AI and machine learning models for task management, decision-making, and personalization.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design the user interface and experience for the AI Life Assistant, considering various interaction modalities such as voice, text, and visual interfaces. The design should be intuitive, adaptive to individual preferences, accessible across multiple platforms, compliant with RFC-5087: User Interface Design for AI Systems, and ensure consistency with our existing product style guide. Additionally, provide design prototypes for validation, considering performance optimization for different devices and network conditions. Address any potential security concerns in the design. Once the design is approved, collaborate with frontend developers to implement the design. Update the task to also include testing for usability, accessibility, and performance, and ensure that the design is future-proof by considering emerging interaction technologies and trends. If possible, provide a timeline for each stage of the design process. Since this task involves both UI/UX design and security considerations, it would be beneficial to assign a team with expertise in these areas.

title: Integration and Deployment
description: Integrate all components, set up deployment pipelines, and prepare for production deployment.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, perform unit, integration, and end-to-end testing, and ensure quality standards are met.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Implement security measures, data protection, and privacy controls to ensure user data and system integrity.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, user guides, and support resources for the AI Life Assistant.
